title: Chiisana Ahiru no Ooki na Ai no Monogatari: Ahiru no Kwak
title_japanese: 小さなアヒルの大きな愛の物語 あひるのクワック
title_synonyms: The Adventures of Alfred J. Quack
synopsis: Alfred J Kwak (Dutch, it takes place in Holland) lost his parents, brothers and sisters when he was young. He was raised by a mole. The series covers the life of Alfred from the day he is born. In his life Alfred tries to help all sorts of animals all over the world. The series are meant to entertain children and teach children about life, covering historical aspects like WW II. (Source: AniDB)
opening_themes: "Spetter, Pieter, Pater" by Herman van Veen (Dutch)"Yakusoku da yo" by Megumi Hayashibara
ending_themes: "Happy Happy ~ Alfred's Walk" by Megumi Hayashibara"Ik ben vandaag zo vrolijk" by Ryan van den Akker and Herman van Veen (Dutch)"Warum bin ich so fröhlich?" by Ryan van den Akker and Herman van Veen (German)
